name: Apply Joints by Topology
description: Analyzes beams and applies given joint types for each topology type.

inputParameters.name: L
inputParameters.description: Joint type to be applied to L topology. Default type is L-Miter. If L-Butt, the beam with a larger cross section area will be used as crossing beam.

inputParameters.name: T
inputParameters.description: Joint type to be applied to T topology. Default type is T-Butt.

inputParameters.name: X
inputParameters.description: Joint type to be applied to X topology. Default type is X-HalfLap.

inputParameters.name: MaxDistance
inputParameters.description: (optional) Maximum distance between centerlines of two Beams (limited to segments) to consider the Beams as connecting. Optional (if omitted, a default value equal to the average beam height will be taken).

outputParameters.name: Info
outputParameters.description: Report and analysis of the found connections and any issues.
